title: Integrate into media upload flow
description: Integrate moderation API into the frontend media upload flow. When users upload media (images, videos, audio), automatically create a moderation record.

title: Integrate handler for approved flow
description: Create frontend handler for approved moderation status. Handle approved status for all types: text, image, video, audio, gallery, personal-tag, global-tag. Update UI to reflect approved status and show content to users.

title: Integrate handler for declined flow
description: Create frontend handler for declined moderation status. Handle declined status for all types: text, image, video, audio, gallery, personal-tag, global-tag. Hide or remove declined content from user view. Display public note to user if provided.

title: Integrate handler for re-submit flow
description: Create frontend handler for re-submit moderation status. Handle re-submit status for all types: text, image, video, audio, gallery, personal-tag, global-tag. Allow users to resubmit content that was previously declined.

title: Email notifications for approved
description: Send email notifications to users when their content is approved. Include content details and approval information. For all types: text, image, video, audio, gallery, personal-tag, global-tag.

title: Email notifications for declined
description: Send email notifications to users when their content is declined. Include public note if provided. Include reason code and explanation. For all types: text, image, video, audio, gallery, personal-tag, global-tag.

title: Email notifications for re-submit
description: Send email notifications to users when content is marked for re-submission. Include instructions for resubmission. For all types: text, image, video, audio, gallery, personal-tag, global-tag.

title: Internal notifications for approved
description: Send internal notifications (in-app) to users when their content is approved. Show notification in user's notification center. For all types: text, image, video, audio, gallery, personal-tag, global-tag.

title: Internal notifications for declined
description: Send internal notifications (in-app) to users when their content is declined. Show notification in user's notification center with public note if provided. For all types: text, image, video, audio, gallery, personal-tag, global-tag.

title: Internal notifications for re-submit
description: Send internal notifications (in-app) to users when content is marked for re-submission. Show notification in user's notification center with resubmission instructions. For all types: text, image, video, audio, gallery, personal-tag, global-tag.

title: Updating global tags and flushing caches
description: When global tags are updated through moderation, flush relevant caches to ensure updated tag data is reflected across the application. Integrate cache flush API call after global tag updates.

title: Updating personal tags and flushing caches
description: When personal tags are updated through moderation, flush relevant caches to ensure updated tag data is reflected across the application. Integrate cache flush API call after personal tag updates.

title: Adding user details slide-in in admin moderation on click of user
description: Add user details slide-in panel in admin moderation page when clicking on user ID. Display user information in a slide-in panel.

title: Add Content Deleted field to meta for soft delete tracking
description: Add contentDeleted field to moderation meta object. When media is soft deleted, update moderation record with contentDeleted: true and contentDeletedAt timestamp. This allows tracking of deleted content in moderation system.
